name: USCoreConditionCategoryExtensionCodes
title: US Core Condition Category Extension Codes
description: Set of codes that are needed for implementation of the US-Core profiles. These codes are used as extensions to the FHIR and US Core value sets.

property.description: A property that indicates the status of the concept. One of active, experimental, deprecated,        retired
